title: A Faery Hunt's King of the Fairies story
desc: Have you ever seen magic left over from a rainstorm?? Have you ever walked in a forest and thought you saw something little and enchanting out of the corner of your eye?? Do you believe in Faeries?? Come find the magic at this fun and gentle quest with the Faeries. You?ll meet faeries and funny creatures, maybe even Faery Royalty!? A perfect show for the young and the young at heart! Most children come in costume.? Wings, garlands, wands, wizard and gnome hats available there for sale for $5-$10.Groups and birthdays are welcome.
